did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Vice President & Chief Financial Officer Records

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The Vice President and Chief Financial Officer is responsible for coordinating the development of financial plans, implementing the annual budget, financial reporting, accounting and debt management.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: University of Connecticut. Vice President & Chief Financial Officer..

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Vice President and Chief Financial Officer is responsible for coordinating the development of financial plans, implementing the annual budget, financial reporting, accounting and debt management.On par with Provost and Vice President and Chief Operating Officer, the VP&CFO reports to the President.

Finance and Administration separated into two departments in 1988 and reunited in 1991. The responsibilities were again separated in 2000 with the appointment of Lorraine Aronson. Records documenting the finances of the institution dated prior to 1999 can be found in the Records of the VP&COO.

p.emph: Chief Clerk and Purchasing Agent, Treasurer, Comptroller
Vice President for Finance and Administration

emph.extref: Vice President and Chief Financial Officer

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collections contains documents, reports, studies and correspondence pertaining to the finances of the institution from 1999 to the present. Earlier materials can be found in the Records of the VP&COO, particularly in Series VIII.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials are listed as boxed and transferred by the creating office.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut, Vice President & Chief Financial Officer Records. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred to the Archives in late 2009.
